#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int arr[1000005];
void fac()
{
	arr[0]=1;
	arr[1]=1;
	for(int i=1;i<=1000000;i++)
	{
		arr[i+1]=arr[i]+arr[i-1];
		if(arr[i+1]%26==0)
		arr[i+1]=26;
		else
		{
			arr[i+1]=arr[i+1]%26;
		}
	}
	
}
int main()
{
	int t,n;
	char c;
	fac();
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		
		cin>>n;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			c=(char)(arr[i]+64);
			cout<<c;
		}
		cout<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
